alert.note: Alert for Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:32PM CDT until June 15 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR WESTERN SARPY...NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER...SOUTHEASTERN SAUNDERS AND NORTHWESTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 1131 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ashland, or 9 miles southwest of Gretna, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gretna, Waverly, Ashland, Greenwood, Memphis, South Bend, Louisville State Recreation Area, Memphis State Recreation Area, Schramm Park State Recreation Area, Mahoney State Park, Camp Carol Joy Holling and Platte River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
